## Elias Sisay - Weekly Report

**Tickets:**

*   **Testing:** BDEV-234 (journal in purchase order approval issue)
*   **In Review:** BDEV-233 (asset integration in purchase modules), BDEV-232 (asset integration in sales modules), BDEV-202 (Purchase order with quotes integration), BDEV-395 (Quote creation for asset Item is displaying error), BDEV-307 ([FE] - Leave Application CRUD).
*   **Ready For Test:** BDEV-231 ([FE] Inside Sales and Purchase Flow: we should show taxes before invoice or bill is approved), BDEV-174 (Missing success/error alert after creating project).
*   **In Progress:** BDEV-410 (Leave intgration), BDEV-308 (Departments & Job Positions), BDEV-240 ([FE] Project Detail page GET transaction items 404.), BDEV-172 (Update failure when editing Purchase Order), BDEV-5 (Leave Request Management).
*   **To Do:** BDEV-468 (Define Project Structure), BDEV-467 (Provide Multiple Views), BDEV-466 (Implement Kanban Board), BDEV-465 (Implement Central Dashboard), BDEV-458 ([TBD]Project ), BDEV-203 (Quotes with purchase requisition integration), BDEV-230 ([FE] Inside line items: when quantity is changed, the before tax value must be updated as well), BDEV-179 (Enable automatic quote generation from Purchase Requisitions), BDEV-193 (Fix PO duplication when selecting the same quote multiple times), BDEV-143 (Creating Bills using Asset Class is not working: Price becomes zero), BDEV-147 ([FE] Inside line items: when quantity is changed, the before tax value must be updated as well), BDEV-145 ([FE] Add correct percentage calculation to projects), BDEV-196 (Enable project list sorting by progress (Pending, Hold, etc.)), BDEV-144 ([FE] Projects integration: sales and purchase flow must be created by checking project status), BDEV-306 ([FE] - Leave Dashboard), BDEV-305 ([FE] - HR Leave Type Configurations).

**Commits:**

*   **Regular Hours:** Updated task and merged 'dev' into BDEV-309.
*   **Overtime:** Worked on update task module, implement project task , integrate leave_type and leave application, update sales order intgration with asset item, description in asset item,departement crud and leave operation. Also, worked on success/error alert after creating project

## Amanuel Belete - Development Report - 2025-09-19

**Focus:** Implementation of the new import feature, including UI adjustments, data normalization, validation handling, and integration with the backend.

**Tickets Summary:**

*   **Testing:** BDEV-229 (Import models with child invoices), BDEV-228 (Handle header validation), BDEV-120 (FE- Implementing the new import feature[sect1]).
*   **Ready For Test:** BDEV-414 (Testing new import feature integration), BDEV-411 (Normalize import for backend), BDEV-138 (Handle backend error on header validation), BDEV-295 (Display table for selected category).
*   **In Progress:** BDEV-398 (Parsing date string), BDEV-396 (Display row validation on table).
*   **To Do:** BDEV-491 (New Imports For [Customers, ...]), BDEV-453 (Testing Bill model with item), BDEV-450 (Arrange UI for new import), BDEV-417 (Update error row validation), BDEV-186 ([FE] Total costs evaluation on Inventory Adjustment), BDEV-200 ([FE] LOV segments parent issue), BDEV-198 (Inventory Item Adjustment Approval Issue), BDEV-149 ([FE] Integrate Address Dropdown inside Employee).
*   **Done:** BDEV-136 (Researching the new import).

**Commits Summary:**

*   **Regular Commits:** Primarily focused on UI adjustments, date formatting, data population, and general import functionality.
*   **Overtime Commits:** Significant effort dedicated to handling errors, updating headers, fixing parsing issues, mapping JSON keys, and normalizing data for backend integration. Also worked on UI components for displaying errors and items. Focus has been on import related features and bug fixes.

**Ayub Ali - Project Status Report - 2025-09-20**

**Tickets:**

*   **Bug:** BDEV-509 - "[FE] Purchase Requisition Create/New page crashes" - Reported 2025-09-19.
*   **In Progress:** BDEV-8 - "Payroll Management", BDEV-6 - "Timesheet Management", and BDEV-7 - "Employee Management".
*   **To Do:** BDEV-485 - "[MA] Employee Self Service to apply for leave.", BDEV-484 - "[MA] Employee Self Service to clock in and clock out.", BDEV-483 - "[FE] Attendance Report Integration.", BDEV-482 - "[FE] Timesheet & Timesheet Entry Integration.", BDEV-481 - "[FE] Payroll Run Integration.", BDEV-480 - "[FE] Employee pay breakdown Integration.", BDEV-479 - "[FE] Overtime Rate Integration.", BDEV-478 - "[FE] Tax & Pension Bracket Integration.", BDEV-477 - "[FE] PayStructure CRUD Integration.", BDEV-476 - "[FE]-PayComponents CRUD Integration.", BDEV-207 - "[BE] Validation for Payroll", BDEV-10 - "Frontend — “Update Employee Page UI”", BDEV-9 - "Backend — “Update employee Models and views”".

**Commits (Regular Hours):**

*   2025-09-19: Merged 'dev' into BDEV-8 (twice)
*   2025-09-18: Timesheet & Timesheet Entries Tables, Forms, and CRUD pages.
*   2025-09-17: Timesheet folder and file structure initialization; Payroll Run CRUD, employee Assignment, payroll Processing, Reviews, and Approval.
*   2025-09-09: Merged 'origin/dev' into BDEV-7; TEMP-BDEV-7 HR-demo

**Commits (Overtime Hours):**

*   2025-09-19: Bug Fix - Employee search API rename.
*   2025-09-18: WIP - Merge branch 'dev' into BDEV-8; Timesheet time picker form field.

## Hanicho0346 - Development Report

**Period:** August 6, 2025 - August 26, 2025

**Summary:**

This report summarizes development activity including bug fixes and feature implementations.

**Regular Commit Activity:**

*   **Vendor Creation:** Fixed an issue related to vendor creation (012d20cd).
*   **Customer Business Account Field:** Created a placeholder for the Customer Business Account field (a112d286).
*   **Locations Form:** Integrated the AddressForm component within the Locations Form (8f3adcb4).

**Overtime Commit Activity:**

*   **Sales/Purchase Orders:** Implemented the display of Payment Terms inside Sales Order and Purchase Order views (18ea24be).
*   **Locations Form:** Addressed and fixed address dropdown integration issues within the Locations Form (1d34174c).
*   **Company Redirect:** Resolved an issue where company redirects were not returning to the previous page on detail views (72d4c70f).
*   **Company Creation Error:** Fixed an error occurring during company creation (ecbc467e).

**Tickets:**

*   No tickets were associated with this report.

overtime_commits.message: Show Payment Terms inside Sales Order and Purchase Order

## Heyab G Gebremariam - Development Report - 2025-08-04 to 2025-09-19

This report summarizes the tickets and commits (regular and overtime) assigned to Heyab G Gebremariam.

**Completed Tickets (Status: Done):**

*   **BDEV-372:** [FE] Vendor Creation form is not sending Expense Account and duplicate fields in General and Accounting tabs.
*   **BDEV-474:** [BE] Remove Ensure Location from Company Model.
*   **BDEV-122:** [FE] Investigating how to make the frontend modular assuming a modular backend.

**Tickets Ready for Test (Status: Ready For Test):**

*   **BDEV-148:** Shipment Validation: Prevent Same-Warehouse Location Movements.
*   **BDEV-472:** Add Asset and Inventory Items List in Warehouse Detail Page.
*   **BDEV-471:** Add Warehouse and Location Dropdown in Create Inventory Item.
*   **BDEV-470:** Add Default Warehouse and Location Tab in Company Settings.
*   **BDEV-377:** [FE] Update Locations List, Detail and Form Pages.
*   **BDEV-139:** Require Warehouse Selection First in Create Shipment.
*   **BDEV-393:** [FE] Wrong error message on a field of Subsidiary creation.
*   **BDEV-390:** [FE+BE] Show Payment Terms inside Sales Order and Purchase Order. Save them during Create and Update.
*   **BDEV-389:** [FE] Create Payment Terms List, Form, Detail Pages.
*   **BDEV-388:** [BE] Create Payment Terms CRUD routes and views.
*   **BDEV-379:** Updating Move Order (Shipment) Model.
*   **BDEV-378:** Assigning Default Warehouse and Location for Companies.
*   **BDEV-376:** Creating Warehouse and Location Models with Default Location Integration.
*   **BDEV-358:** [FE] On Receipt creation and update the "check_no" field is being sent as number but should be string.
*   **BDEV-293:** [FE] Create Customer Business Account field placeholder is wrong.
*   **BDEV-190:** Filter accounts in company setup based on account type.
*   **BDEV-187:** Integrate Address Dropdown inside Locations Form.
*   **BDEV-290:** [FE] Description field is not being sent on Budget Calendar creation.
*   **BDEV-288:** [FE] SideNav Search is not working properly. when we search sales it doesn't bring sales module.
*   **BDEV-195:** Add Payment Term and Discount Term to Company Settings.
*   **BDEV-154:** [FE] Company settings: payroll tab doesn't show the backend errors correctly.
*   **BDEV-117:** [FE] Adding Access Guard to Budget Module.
*   **BDEV-167:** GL fields for asset posting require validation.
*   **BDEV-140:** [FE] Delete button in Inventory Item detail page doesn't do anything.
*   **BDEV-123:** [FE] Investigate Calendar Selector: It is not correctly changing the years.
*   **BDEV-135:** [FE] Changing companies should redirect to a list view or another page if the current page is viewing a specific resource or sub-resource.

**Tickets In Progress (Status: In Progress):**

*   **BDEV-455:** Add Location During Asset Item Import (Future).
*   **BDEV-475:** Fix Update Locations Functionality.
*   **BDEV-392:** Add Shipment Form in Purchase Order, Bills, and Payment.
*   **BDEV-382:** Add Shipment Form in Sales Order, Invoice, and Receipt.
*   **BDEV-473:** Ensure Parent Location is valid Parent Location Type.
*   **BDEV-498:** Reviewing HR PR.

**Tickets To Do (Status: To Do):**

*   **BDEV-503:** Posting of the Approved supplementary Budget to GL.
*   **BDEV-501:** The approval of the Supplementary Budget Requests.
*   **BDEV-488:** Manual Bank Reconciliation.
*   **BDEV-487:** Auto Bank Reconciliation.
*   **BDEV-380:** [TBD] Integrating Sales Flow with Warehouse Operations.
*   **BDEV-492:** [TBD] Add Asset Items and Inventory Items Tab inside Warehouse Detail Page.
*   **BDEV-381:** Fix Shipment Approval Issue on Test Server.
*   **BDEV-300:** [FE] Sales Order edit page doesn't load sales order items.
*   **BDEV-171:** Asset name field allows random or invalid characters.
*   **BDEV-124:** [FE] Bill and payment access guard is not checking approval flow.
*   **BDEV-188:** Implement quote term durations and automatic expiration handling.
*   **BDEV-194:** Relocate Chart of Account configuration to All Setup options.
*   **BDEV-184:** Ensure asset availability for all existing companies.
*   **BDEV-178:** Enable linking Purchase Orders to existing approved Quotes.
*   **BDEV-176:** Convert purchased items into fixed assets upon receipt.
*   **BDEV-170:** Asset class search and filter return all results: Filters and search fail in asset class list view.
*   **BDEV-169:** Asset Item search and filter return all results: Filters and search fail in  list view.
*   **BDEV-158:** Period check exception models [employee].
*   **BDEV-157:** Clicking on notifications has a flashing error "error fetching notifications" that disapears as the page goes to the notification page.
*   **BDEV-189:** Validate invoice date against payment term rules for due date and penalties.
*   **BDEV-191:** Display active invitation link tied to company role.
*   **BDEV-199:** [FE] Update pages: business account search field un-setting issue.
*   **BDEV-197:** Test onboarding workflow using multiple user roles on test server.
*   **BDEV-153:** [TBD] Create purchase order: if vendor has quotes and quotes is not selected it says invalid UUID length.
*   **BDEV-500:** The Recommendation of the supplementary budget.
*   **BDEV-499:** The Preparation of the Supplementary Budget Request.
*   **BDEV-446:** Budget Module with Service Management.
*   **BDEV-445:** Budget Module Integration with Payment.
*   **BDEV-255:** Payroll Module Integration Budget.
*   **BDEV-256:** Inventory Module Integration with Purchase.

*   **BDEV-251:** Fixed Asset Module Integration with Purchase.
*   **BDEV-250:** Fixed Asset Module Integration with Inventory.
*   **BDEV-266:** Cash Management Integration with Budget.
*   **BDEV-269:** Budget Module Integration with HR.
*   **BDEV-249:** Fixed Asset Module Integration with General Ledger (Accounting).
*   **BDEV-270:** Budget Module Integration with Financials (Sales and Purchase).
*   **BDEV-271:** Budget Module Integration with General Ledger.
*   **BDEV-443:** Budget Module Integration with Lease.
*   **BDEV-248:** General Ledger (Accounting) module Integration with All Modules.
*   **BDEV-427:** Warehouse Management sub-Module with Accounting.
*   **BDEV-428:** Warehouse Management sub- module with Shipment.
*   **BDEV-429:** Lease Management Module with Asset Management Module.
*   **BDEV-430:** Lease management with Purchase Module.
*   **BDEV-431:** Lease Management with HRM module.
*   **BDEV-432:** Lease Management with Project management.
*   **BDEV-433:** Lease Management with Sales Module.
*   **BDEV-434:** Service management with Sales Module.
*   **BDEV-435:** Service Management with Accounting Module.
*   **BDEV-436:** Service Management with Inventory Module.
*   **BDEV-437:** Service Management with Purchase Module.

*   **BDEV-440:** HRM Management with Accounting Module.
*   **BDEV-441:** HRM Management with Purchase module.
*   **BDEV-442:** HRM Management with Sales Module.
*   **BDEV-426:** Warehouse management Sub-module with Purchase module.
*   **BDEV-425:** Warehouse management sub-module with Sales Module.
*   **BDEV-451:** Bank Account Reconciliation.

**Tickets with Bug Reports (Status: Bug Reports):**

*   **BDEV-424:** creating quote for asset Item.
*   **BDEV-423:** Asset Item purchase process.
*   **BDEV-422:** Purchase OverView issue.
*   **BDEV-421:** Asset class Acquisition and  Revaluation Date issue.
*   **BDEV-420:** Asset Item page Issue.
*   **BDEV-419:** Purchase order creation : before tax value set to zero, Total is empty.
*   **BDEV-418:** Partial Bill creation for received purchase order setting remaining number to zero issue.
*   **BDEV-412:** Purchase order creation : before tax value set to zero, Total value is empty.

**Tickets in Testing:**

*   **BT-77:** Purchase,asset,sale, inventory OverView also dashboard pageissue.
*   **BT-82:** service Item created successfully and displayed in both pages(item, service pages).

**Tickets with Test Planned:**

*   **BT-83:** OVerview page.

**Commits:**

*   A high volume of commits related to feature development on Warehousing and Location Management(BDEV-376, BDEV-377, BDEV-470, BDEV-471, BDEV-472, BDEV-139), and Payment Terms (BDEV-389, BDEV-195).  Bug fixes and merging of other feature branches also contribute a significant portion of the commits.  Side navigation improvements and access guard implementations are present as well.  Commit messages suggest a focus on feature completion and addressing critical front-end issues.

**Overtime Commits:**

*   Overtime commits appear focused on completing features related to warehouse management (BDEV-471, BDEV-470, BDEV-377), fixing issues, and merging code.

**Summary:**

Heyab G Gebremariam has been actively involved in developing and fixing features related to warehouse management, location management, payment terms and access control. A substantial number of tickets are now ready for testing, indicating significant progress. Bug fixing has also been a focus.

ai_summary:
**Report for Mahile**

This report summarizes recent commits, including regular and overtime contributions. There are no associated tickets.

**Regular Commits:**

*   **Receipt Creation/Update Fix (Aug 26):** Addressed an issue where the `check_no` field was incorrectly sent as a number instead of a string in the frontend.
*   **Merge (Aug 15):** Merged `dev` branch into GY-2086.
*   **Company Settings - Payroll Error Display (Aug 11):** Fixed an issue where backend errors were not correctly displayed in the payroll tab of company settings.
*   **Update Pages - Business Account Search (Aug 7):** Resolved an issue where the business account search field was being unset on update pages (GY-1940).

**Overtime Commits:**

*   **Subsidiary Creation Error Message Fix (Aug 26):** Corrected a wrong error message on a field during Subsidiary creation.
*   **Budget Calendar Description Field Fix (Aug 20):** Ensured the description field is being sent on Budget Calendar creation (BDEV-290).
*   **SideNav Search Fix (Aug 15):** Fixed an issue where the SideNav search was not working correctly (BDEV-288).
*   **Merge (Aug 12):** Merged `dev` branch into GY-2086.
*   **Update Pages - Business Account Search (Aug 11 & Aug 7):** Addressed the business account search field un-setting issue on update pages (GY-1940). This work spanned multiple days.

**In Progress:**

**To Do:**

ai_summary:
## Shalomjes - Development Report - 2025-09-19

**Tickets:**

*   **Blocked:** BDEV-134 (Lease crud issue) requires attention.
*   **To Do:** BDEV-508 (Lease Payment Collection), BDEV-457 (Service Integration into Sales Module), BDEV-496 (Add Payment History on Service), BDEV-166 (Notification action buttons not working for budget workflow), BDEV-165 (Worksheet lines can exceed overall budget without warning), BDEV-156 (The Payrol page has a column PayrolId that is empty).
*   **In Review:** BDEV-456 (Integrate service into purchase module line item), BDEV-246 (Evaluate Time/ Expense Tickets), BDEV-287 (Edit time/expense ticket).
*   **Ready For Test:** BDEV-493 (Company as Leaser functionality), BDEV-407 (Service Front-end integration).
*   **Dev Completed:** BDEV-416 (Integrate service with line items in purchase modules), BDEV-408 (Service crud).
*   **Done:** BDEV-304 (FE - Add required documents upload to lease creation), BDEV-494 (Update Note List UI), BDEV-403 (Note Edit functioning), BDEV-384 (Lessor document sequencing fix), BDEV-297 (Add Lease Name field), BDEV-173 (Error creating Time and Expense Ticket entry), BDEV-133 (Lease document sequencing prefix), BDEV-119 (Budget Adjustment considers available amount), BDEV-150 (Integrate Address drop-downs on Leases).

**Commits (Regular Hours):**

*   **Service Module:** Continued work on Service CRUD functionality and integrating Service items into purchase modules.
*   **Note UI:** UI updates to the note feature, including bug fixes and edit functionality.
*   **Lease Module:** Added Lease Name field, fixed delete issues, and improved create/edit functionality.
*   **Lessor Module:** Fixed Lessor delete functionality and integrated address fields.

**Commits (Overtime):**

*   **Lease Module:** Addressed lease CRUD related bug
*   **Service Module:** Implemented Service History functionality and integrated services into sales modules.
*   **Note UI:** Continued improvements to Note UI.
*   **Lessor Module:** Fixed lessor validation issues and implemented document sequencing.
*   **Budget Module:** Budget adjustment logic and fixed document redirect issue.
*   **Time/Expense Tickets:** Resolved create errors and improved edit/view functionality.
